item.description:
Beginners Welcome!!
Men, Women, Singles, Couples


Doors open at 6:00pm.
Instructional Hour starts @6:15 p.m.**
Courtesy Note:: Please be on time.
Practice outside of class is expected and necessary.

Steppin'Practice 6:00 pm-8:30 pm.

**Certified Instruction provided by the Boston Steps Team**

Full Bar!!
We welcome you to stop by to get an idea of what Steppin' Chicago Style is all about. There is a $5 participation fee to get on the dance floor, first visit is FREE. We ask that you patronize the bar and tip the staff for their services.

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: The Boston Steps Class & Practice
